tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_nomads_vocabulary_lists (
    list_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    vocabulary_word VARCHAR(50),
    translation VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES digital_nomads_language_progress(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE language_learning_progress (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    language VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    progress_percentage INT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, language)
);

CREATE TABLE vocabulary_lists (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    language VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    word VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    translation VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, language, word)
);

CREATE TABLE vocabulary_lists (
    list_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    language VARCHAR(50),
    word VARCHAR(50),
    translation VARCHAR(50),
    example_sentence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE countries (
    country_id INT,
    country_name VARCHAR(50),
    continent VARCHAR(50),
    official_language VARCHAR(50),
    currency VARCHAR(50)
);
